title: That the General Committee meeting minutes of October 7, 2024 be approved.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report FCSFS24-024, dated October 28, 2024 of the Commissioner, Finance and Corporate Support Services as follows: That Council authorize staff to proceed as outlined in Closed Session Report FCSFS24-024 dated October 28, 2024, of the Commissioner, Finance and Corporate Support Services, respecting an agreement between the City of Peterborough and the County of Peterborough for consolidated municipal services.

City-wide - Report FCSFS24-023, Delegated Authority for Intermunicipal Child Care Agreements - Report CSSS24-021, Community Housing Strategic Framework for Service Agreements - Report CSSS24-022, and 555 Bonaccord Street Tax Exemption -Report CSSS24-023 be approved on Consent.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-012, dated October 28, 2024, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from Chief Betts respecting the F.I.R.S.T. program be received for information.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-012, dated October 28, 2024, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from Chief Betts respecting the F.I.R.S.T. program be received for information. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOGR24-006 dated October 28, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That the Physician Recruitment and Retention presentation be received for information.

e) That staff be directed to provide to Council electronically, agendas for those advisory committee meetings that staff attend, which are listed on pages three and four of Report COU24-002. f) If approved , the governance of advisory committees and council’s participation on local boards, municipal corporations and third party organizations be reviewed at the end of the term for possible recommendations for consideration for the term of 2026-2030

d) That, effective November 4, 2024, Councillor Parnell be appointed as the Presiding Officer for public meeting matters comprising the Planning Act at General Committee. e) That staff be directed to provide to Council electronically, agendas for those advisory committee meetings that staff attend, which are listed on pages three and four of Report COU24-002. f) If approved , the governance of advisory committees and council’s participation on local boards, municipal corporations and third party organizations be reviewed at the end of the term for possible recommendations for consideration for the term of 2026-2030

d) That, effective November 4, 2024, Councillor Parnell be appointed as the Presiding Officer for public meeting matters comprising the Planning Act at General Committee. e) That staff be directed to provide to Council electronically, agendas for those advisory committee meetings that staff attend, which are listed on pages three and four of Report COU24-002. f) If approved , the governance of advisory committees and council’s participation on local boards, municipal corporations and third party organizations be reviewed at the end of the term for possible recommendations for consideration for the term of 2026-2030 That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSRS24-017, dated October 28, 2024 of the Commissioner, Legislative Services as follows: That staff be authorized to proceed with the demolition of 595 Sherbrooke Street, Peterborough.

That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report IPGACP24-025, dated October 28, 2024 of the Commissioner of Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management as follows: a) That Report IPGACP24-025, including the attached draft Site Alteration By-Law, be received for information; b) That Staff proceed with public consultation on a proposed Site Alteration By- Law; and c) That Staff return in 2025 with a final version of the By-Law for adoption by Council, including a summary of feedback received during the public consultation period.
That staff be directed to provide a report to Council on the Heritage park subdivision.
That this meeting be adjourned at 9:25 p.m.
